channel.title: same shortcut names (different in paths) = confusion
channel.description:
there some shortcuts names in the shortcuts list have identical names but not the same paths, like:-
- "Help"
there r two of them
first one:-
qubes-desktop-run /usr/share/applications/yelp.desktop
second one:-
qubes-desktop-run /usr/share/applications/kde4/Help.desktop
- "imageMagic (display Q16)"
first one:-
qubes-desktop-run /usr/share/applications/display-img6.desktop
and the second one is:-
qubes-desktop-run /usr/share/applications/display-img6.q16.desktop
- "Tor Browser"
first one:-
qubes-desktop-run /usr/share/applications/anondist-torbrowser.desktop
second one:-
qubes-desktop-run /usr/share/applications/janondisttorbrowser.desktop

item.title: same shortcut names (different in paths) = confusion
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/1669 milestone is set to Qubes 4.1 with the label help-wanted added to the ticket. In my observation which could be wrong the probability for getting this fixed without a contributor popping up out of nowhere in mid term future is low.

Read full topic

item.title: same shortcut names (different in paths) = confusion
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
The mlinestone for https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/1669 is set to Qubes 4.0.

Gnome vs KDE applications will be sorted out for Whonix 14.

  • https://phabricator.whonix.org/T467
  • https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/1781

item.title: same shortcut names (different in paths) = confusion
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
same happening with whonix 13 , but this time we have terminal and konsole ? (why gnome stuff inside whonix?)

paths:-

konsole

qubes-desktop-run /usr/sahre/applications/kde4/konsole.desktop

terminal

qubes-desktop-run /usr/sahre/applications/gnome-terminal.desktop

Read full topic

there some shortcuts names in the shortcuts list have identical names but not the same paths, like:-

there r two of them
